section.heading: Prerequisites for order of publication.
section.text: An order for the substitution of publication for personal service may not be made until:

para.text: A summons for the defendant has been issued and returned "not to be found"; and
The plaintiff proves by affidavit to the satisfaction of the court:
The nonresidence of the defendant or his or her absence for at least 6 months; or
Diligent efforts to find the defendant or that the defendant seeks to avoid service of process by concealment.
